events.message: I reported a collision involving my vehicle that occurred last night at the intersection. The car sustained significant front-end damage and I need to start a claim immediately.
The claim has been categorised under 'Auto Accident' after reviewing the details submitted regarding the car collision and damage.
An agent has been assigned to your case who will be your point of contact throughout the claims process for this auto incident.
Your claim for the vehicle collision has been formally acknowledged and entered into our system to begin processing.
Please provide photos of the damaged car, police report, and repair estimates so we can proceed with your claim investigation.
The requested pictures of the damaged vehicle, police documentation, and repair quotes have been submitted successfully for review.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing all submitted evidence relating to the auto accident to assess the claim thoroughly.
The investigation into your auto claim has been completed, confirming the events described and validating the extent of the vehicle damage.
A settlement for your auto claim has been proposed based on damage assessment and coverage terms specified in your policy.
You have provided positive feedback expressing appreciation for the timely updates and clear communication during your claim process.
Your auto accident claim has been approved and validated for the agreed settlement amount with all conditions satisfied.
The approved payment for your vehicle damage claim has been processed and should arrive in your account within three business days.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed following payment and resolution of all related issues and inquiries.
This claim record has now been archived in our system for future reference and to maintain compliance and audit standards.
